text: Ian Smith (born 19 June 1938) is an Australian actor, television producer and screenwriter. He was born in Melbourne, Australia. He is known for his role as Harold Bishop in the television series Neighbours. He also played Ted Douglas in the television series Prisoner, while also writing and producing some episodes. In December 2024, it was revealed that Smith was diagnosed with terminal lung cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Ian Smith as Harold Bishop * Ian Smith in Panto at Grand Opera House York Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian stage actors Category:Australian voice actors Category:Australian television producers Category:Australian television writers Category:Writers from Melbourne Category:Actors from Melbourne
title: Ian Smith (actor)
